info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:39PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Madison, north central Beaverhead and central Jefferson Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 539 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Ovando to 18 miles west of Helena to 7 miles southwest of Basin to 13 miles west of Dillon. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, Lincoln, East Helena, Montana City, Basin, Wickes, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Elkhorn State Park, Marysville, Elk Park, Clancy, Canyon Creek and Jefferson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
